metadata.title: CVE-2017-7614 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: elflink.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), asdistributed in GNU Binutils 2.28, has a "member access within null pointer"undefined behavior issue, which might allow remote attackers to cause adenial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified otherimpact via an "int main() {return 0;}" program.

criterions.comment: binutils package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
